title: Neither A 'Sissy' Nor A Saint: An Offer Of Priesthood Prompts A Coming Out
teaser: When he was young, Michael Arceneaux was a model Catholic who never missed a mass, but when he was asked to join the priesthood, it didn't make him come to Jesus â€” it made him come out of the closet.
